@context.description: URL of context document, which could be 'https://w3id.org/locolligo/contexts/xLP.jsonld'.

indexing.description: Schema.org object describing the dataset. Used for indexing by Google and other search engines.

creator.description: This array contains the names and affiliations of Persons and Organisations responsible for the creation of the dataset.

url.description: URL for the Person or Organisation. Could be a Person's ORCID URL.

license.description: A URL or string giving the licence terms for the dataset.

identifier.description: A URL for the dataset. This will usually be identical to the properties.@id.

temporalCoverage.description: The time period covered by the dataset. See https://schema.org/temporalCoverage.

spatialCoverage.description: The geographical area covered by the dataset.

features.description: This array contains the primary subjects of the dataset. They will usually be geolocated, but this is optional.
